amendment.description: To require the Tennessee Valley Authority to grant certain use restrictions.

vote.text: Amendment SA 811 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 811 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Sessions.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 811 proposed by Senator Boxer for Senator Sessions.
